title: Experienced Founders with an Outside Perspective
subtitle: A proven leadership combination of strategic execution and technical innovation

members.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
members.bio: Former VP Clinical Development at Genentech with 15+ years in oncology drug development. Led multiple Phase III trials to successful FDA approval.

members.name: Michael Rodriguez
members.bio: Former Director of Clinical Operations with expertise in global trial management and site optimization. Built clinical systems at top 10 pharma.

members.name: Dr. Jennifer Walsh
members.bio: Former FDA reviewer with deep regulatory expertise. Led clinical strategy for multiple successful drug approvals across therapeutic areas.
